trans-unit.source: Defines properties and methods for all activity designers that have a sequential vertical layout on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Define as propriedades e métodos para todos os estruturadores de atividades que têm um esquema sequencial vertical na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The SequentialActivityDesigner and classes that inherit from it can contain child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]As classes que herdam dela e SequentialActivityDesigner podem conter os estruturadores de atividades subordinadas.

trans-unit.source: Their appearance on the workflow design surface is organized vertically, with child activities displayed on the surface of the SequentialActivityDesigner.
trans-unit.target: Seu aspeto na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho está organizado verticalmente, com atividades subordinadas apresentadas na superfície do SequentialActivityDesigner.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that allows the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> to adjust its UI for users who have disabilities.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> que permite que o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref> para ajustar a interface de utilizador para os utilizadores com incapacidades.

trans-unit.source: If the initial value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> creates an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor inicial do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>é uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> to associate with the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> para associar o estruturador.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> can be expanded and collapsed on the workflow designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref> pode ser expandido e fechado na superfície do designer de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: If CanExpandCollapse returns `true`, the designer renders an expand-collapse button on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Se devolver CanExpandCollapse `true`, o estruturador composições um botão de fechar expandir a superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: If the parent designer of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> is <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>, CanExpandCollapse returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o estruturador de principal do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>é <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>, CanExpandCollapse devolve `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> is the root designer, CanExpandCollapse returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>é a raiz estruturador, CanExpandCollapse devolve `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer can be expanded and collapsed on the workflow design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o estruturador pode ser expandido e fechado na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the designer is expanded on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o estruturador está expandido na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> is expanded on the workflow design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref> é expandido na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto selecionável primeira na ordem de navegação do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que é o objeto selecionável primeira na ordem de navegação do estruturador.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of rectangles that bound the activity designer's connectors.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma matriz de retângulos vinculado conectores o designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: If the current designer is not the active designer or if the designer is not expanded, GetConnectors returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: Se o estruturador atual não é o estruturador de Active Directory ou se o estruturador não está expandido, GetConnectors devolve uma matriz vazia.

trans-unit.source: If there are no activity designers in the parent designer, GetConnectors returns an array of one rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma estruturadores de atividades no designer principal, GetConnectors devolve uma matriz de um retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that bounds the connectors.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> matriz bounds os conectores.

trans-unit.source: Returns array of rectangles that represent the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de devolve de retângulos que representam as localizações de largar válido dentro de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that defines the x- and y-coordinates for the drop target.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que define as coordenadas x e y para o destino de largar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that represents the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> matriz que representa as localizações de largar válido dentro de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o objeto selecionável primeiro que se segue o objeto especificado na ordem de navegação de atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current object in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual a ordem de navegação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"> </xref> valor de enumeração que determina a ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable that follows the obj parameter in the navigation order of the .
trans-unit.target: O primeiro selecionável que se segue o obj parâmetro ordem de navegação do .

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of glyphs that are associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção só de leitura de glifos que estão associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph"></xref> read-only collection that contains all of the glyphs to display on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph"> </xref> só de leitura coleção que contém todos os glifos a apresentar no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> contains no other activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto a apresentar quando o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref> não contém nenhum outros os estruturadores de atividades.

trans-unit.source: The HelpText property value is displayed on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> surface when it contains no child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade HelpText é apresentado no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>superfície quando contém não estruturadores de atividades subordinadas.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text to display on the designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o texto a apresentar na superfície do designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that serves as the bounds for the text displayed by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o rectângulo que funciona como os limites para o texto apresentado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText*>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that serves as the bounds for the text displayed by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que funciona como os limites para o texto apresentado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText*>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height and width of the text to display in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> when it contains no child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura e largura do texto a apresentar no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando contém não estruturadores de atividades subordinadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that defines the height and width of the text displayed by <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> when it contains no child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que define a altura e largura do texto apresentado pela <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando contém não estruturadores de atividades subordinadas.

trans-unit.source: By default HelpTextSize is set to a newly initialized <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição HelpTextSize está definido para um recentemente inicializado <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified point on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Devolve informações sobre o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref> o momento especificado na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The information returned by HitTest is based on the point on the workflow design surface that was passed to it.
trans-unit.target: As informações devolvidas pelo HitTest baseia-se o ponto na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho que foi passado ao mesmo.

trans-unit.source: It includes the activity designer associated with the point, the bounds of that activity designer, the exact hit location of the point, any selectable objects associated with the point, and any user data associated with the point.
trans-unit.target: Inclui o designer de atividade associado com o ponto, os limites do estruturador atividade, a localização de acessos exata do ponto de, quaisquer objetos selecionáveis associados com o ponto e quaisquer dados de utilizador associados com o ponto de.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> location on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> localização na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho do qual pretende recolher informações.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer by using the specified activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o estruturador utilizando a atividade especificada.

trans-unit.source: Initialize assigns a value for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText%2A> property that is displayed on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> if it does not contain any child designers.
trans-unit.target: Inicializar atribui um valor para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText%2A>propriedade que é apresentada no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>se não contém qualquer designers subordinados.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with which to initialize the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> com a qual ao inicializar o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último objeto selecionável ordem de navegação do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que é o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do estruturador.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de esquema para a posição ajudas visuais e designers subordinado no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os argumentos de esquema.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: econtém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define o tamanho dos ajudas visuais em estruturadores contidos o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os argumentos de esquema.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the new size settings for <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que contém as novas definições de tamanho para <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws the visual representation of activity at design time.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a representação visual de atividade no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the drawing arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os argumentos de desenho.
